Class Pirates

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.model.adventurecard.Pirates
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Pirates extends AdventureCard
Represents a Pirates adventure card.

This card initiates a combat scenario where the player must meet a required firepower level to defeat the pirates. Failure to do so results in penalties such as lost days and damage from incoming shots. Success is rewarded with coins.

The card defines a number of incoming Shot instances, which must be defended against using batteries and cannons.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Pirates

      public Pirates(String id, AdventureCard.Type type, int lostDays, int firePower, int coins, List<Shot> shots) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a new Pirates adventure card with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the card.
      type - the type of the card (usually LEVEL1, LEVEL2).
      lostDays - the number of days lost if the player fails to defend.
      firePower - the firepower threshold required to defeat the pirates.
      coins - the reward granted for successfully defeating the pirates.
      shots - the list of incoming Shot instances representing pirate attacks.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any value is negative or the shot list is null/empty.
      NullPointerException - if any shot in the list is null.
